title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on ollama-js with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any server channel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama locally for private voice-assistant pipelines.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor or chat with code using Ollama models.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official Modelfile registry; community submitted quantization configs for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot server that listens for mentions and replies using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run Ollama prompts inside notes for summarization or brainstorming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama models into mobile or desktop apps.
